question:
Consider the following pairs of musicians with their associated instruments:
  1. Ustad Amjad Ali Khan - Santoor
  2. Pt. Shiv Kumar Sharma - Sitar
  3. Hari Prasad Chaurasia - Flute
Which of the above pairs is/are correctly matched?
explanation:
Ustad Amjad Ali Khan - Sarod
Pt. Shiv Kumar Sharma - Santoor
Hari Prasad Chaurasia - Flute
